author: Techlore
description:
Germany just blocked Chat Control, stopping the EU from mandating encryption backdoors and client-side scanning of all messages. This victory proves citizen activism works - but the fight isn't over. Here's what happened, why it matters, and what you need to do next to keep digital privacy alive. Techlore empowers individuals with practical digital privacy knowledge, security tools, and advocacy resources. Discover how to protect your online data and regain control of your digital identity.

title: We Just DEFEATED EU Mass Surveillance (Here's How)
